description: Open Forms, Open Zaak, Open Notificaties and Objects API logs

panels.description: The total number of completed form submissions
panels.title: Submission count

panels.description: The total number of successfully registered form submissions
panels.title: Registered submission count

targets.expr: {app="openformulieren-worker"} | json | event="registration_failure" | trigger = "on_completion"

sum(
    count_over_time (
        {app="openzaak"}
        | json 
        | event = "request" 
        | source = "uwsgi" 
        | method = "POST"
        | path = "/zaken/api/v1/zaken"
        [$__range]
    )
) or vector(0)
{app="openzaak"} | json | event="zaak_created"

{app="openzaak"}
| json
| event = "request_finished"
| request !~ `GET .*` 
| event = `request_finished` 
| code =~ `[4-5].*`

sum(
    count_over_time (
        {app="objecten"}
        | json 
        | event = "request" 
        | source = "uwsgi" 
        | method = "POST"
        | path = "/api/v2/objects"
        [$__range]
    )
) or vector(0)
{app="objecten"} | json | event = "object_created"

{app="objecten"}
| json
| event = "request_finished"
| request = "POST /api/v2/objects"
| code >= 400

panels.description: Notifications received from Open Zaak and Objects API
panels.title: Notifications received from applications

targets.expr: sum by (app) (count_over_time({app="$app"}[$__interval]))

panels.title: The amount of log records for particular component

targets.expr: {app="$subapp"}

title: Logging Maykin components
